The goal of the game is to reach the target number, with minimum number of transformations applied to the given number. You swipe in upwards direction to flip the number +1, and in downwards direction to flip the number -1. By clicking on the up/down arrows you flip all numbers by 1. In order to unlock the achievements, it is recommended to be signed-in with Google, while playing.
